title: 6 Summer Hairstyles That Will Make You Go From Oh To Wow!
text:
facebook 
After a breezy winter, summer is finally here with the hope of sun-kissed beach vacations, exotic trips abroad and parties galore. With a long summer ahead and a ton of plans in our kitty, we all need a little makeover to beat the heat. As you switch from your denims to summer dresses, make sure you add some summer hairstyles to your style list too. After all, you need to know the tricks of the trade to flaunt your gorgeous locks in this heat. Giving you a quick heads up, we are here with the best of summer hairstyle trends to get you started. 1. Wrap and roll with a bandana/scarf Pinterest 
This one's easy to pull off. All you need to do is tie a bandana or a scarf around your head and throw your hair up in a messy bun. It gives you a perfectly chic look and helps you beat the heat at the same time. Looks like a complete win-win situation to me! 2. The reverse braided bun Pinterest 
Now, this may take a little more than a minute to style but when done properly the results are jaw-dropping. All you need to do is start at the bottom and make your way upwards rolling your hair into a bun for the desired look. 3. Side braid hairdo Pinterest 
Braids are in and it's time you catch up with this growing trend. Start by braiding a little section of hair on the sides and then seamlessly add the rest of your hair to into the braid to give your pigtail more volume. 4. The messy cross ponytail Pinterest 
Give your regular ponytail a break by adding a little twist to it. Keep it classy and easy with this messy yet easy cross ponytail. 5. The messy hair bun Pinterest 
This one is perfect for a dinner date or a special rendezvous. You need to start with a ponytail and twist your hair in to give it a messy bun look. 6. Beach waves Syska 
This is perfect for a day out on the beach or a holiday. Style your side braids like a crown and add a few waves to your hair with a curling iron. You can buy it here . 
So, which ones are you trying this summer? If you are looking to sport several different styles this summer, make sure you have a good straightening iron or curling iron at your disposal. Pick up a curling and straightening iron from Syska Personal Care products at bargained rates before you get started and if you need more styling tips, just take a look at their DIY tutorials for the beach wave hairstyle.
